item.description:
China calls the war in Gaza a "disgrace to civilisation".

Beijing urges an immediate ceasefire as the conflict stretches into its sixth month. US President Biden has urged Hamas to accept a ceasefire plan with Israel before the start of Ramadanhttps://t.co/1pXLHEloYc pic.twitter.com/p6ASpFfim9

‚Äî AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024
